Articles.Content: I just had a small update, I think I have the new SAS systems. Tried it on a few flights and the RCS nor the ASAS systems are jittering like before.. space center is still the same though. My version is now 20.2.186. anyone else?
That's the version for 0.20.2 since it's been released. (I'm running the store version with updates turned off)
How long has it been out? I checked and my version number hasn't changed, but an un-updated version has the jittering sas and the updated version has smooth sas. both 20.2.186

I. Am. Dying. Of. Suspense.

Seriously, no worries, we all make mistakes.

I think...someone is trippin...hard..

I think...someone is trollin...hard...

What!?! Erroneous!

But seriously I do not think there was any update and my ships are handling as usual
Nothing to see here, folks. x.186 is the same build we've been on for a long time.
